active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a resource-limited organization, debate the trade-offs of implementing real-time configuration monitoring versus scheduled scans. Consider factors like cost, detection latency, scalability, and false positive rates. Support your position with NIST SP 800-128 guidelines and real-world examples.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

additional_activities.activity: Think-Pair-Share: Discuss misconceptions (e.g., 'Does real-time monitoring catch all vulnerabilities instantly? Why/why not?').
Role-playing: Act as SOC analysts responding to a config drift alert in a simulated environment.
Group simulation: Build a mock baseline and monitor changes in a virtual lab using tools like Ansible or Puppet.
